review.title: “helpful company”
review.pros: Pros – The staff is very helpful and friendly. They treat you like family. They are always trying to give advice and willing to listen to your problems. They are very proactive with this market. Althought some of there ideas are dated. The effort is what counts. They are very very helpful with everything that one could imagine in the field of real estate
review.cons: Cons – The downsides are not with the company. They are witht the overall market. But lack of quick closings causes long gaps between commissions, marketing expenses, phone expenses, too much competition. The website does not produce viable leads for the sales force.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – They need to define their message to the public and positiion themselves for the market to come and for the current market. They need a long trainning process.
